'''House Blount''' is a [[Noble house|vassal house]] from [[the Crownlands]]. It holds fealty to [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Blount is a vassal house sworn to the [[Iron Throne]]. They blazon their arms with a red bend sinister between two black porcupines on green.
